info.title: Platformatic DB
info.description: Exposing a SQL database as REST

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

post.description: Add new owner to the database.

put.description: Update one or more owners in the database.

get.description: Fetch Owner using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more owners from the Database.

get.description: Fetch all the posts for owner from the database.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

post.description: Add new post to the database.

put.description: Update one or more posts in the database.

get.description: Fetch Post using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more posts from the Database.

get.description: Fetch the owner for post from the database.
